Server.Name: ExcitusXtremeV2
Server.Description:
ExcitusXtremeV2 (V2.0.2) Attention this version of ExcitusXtreme only runs under Alpha18.4 Stable *IMPORTANT!! After installation, you should definitely use one of the pre-made worlds
*ExcitusXtremeV2smal (4K EAC on)
*ExcitusXtremeV2medium (8K EAC on)
*ExcitusXtremeV2Extra (8K EAC off)
*ExcitusXtremeV2Ultra (8K EAC off)
when starting the game for the first time. One of these worlds should also be selected for a server installation
installation Server download the link below and copy it in this structure on your server
https://git.memolp.de/MeMoLP/ExcitusXtremeV2/archive/master.zip
*Description
You can find support and descriptions at: https://memolp.de
Credits *thanks to Nachtschatten and Houzi for helping
*thanks to guppy for new zombies and green eyes and more
*thanks to Bdubs for Vehicles
*thanks to Scomar82 for Disamble Ammo
*thanks to Macinvisible and Zyncosa for the nice new Traders
*thanks to Xyth for Animals
*thanks to Claymore for Stainless Steel back
*thanks to Snukfin and Robeloto for new zombies and questsounds
*and everyone else I forgot

Server.Name: ExcitusXtremeV3
Server.Description:
ExcitusXtreme (V3) Attention this version of ExcitusXtreme only runs under Alpha18.4 Stable *IMPORTANT!! You need start New Random World. You have all the Prefabs in your Random Wolrd
ExcitusXtreme V3 is a very hard MOD with many surprises. The new V3 is even harder than the V2. Many new items and blocks have been added.
installation Server download the link below and copy it in this structure on your server
https://git.memolp.de/MeMoLP/ExcitusXtremeV3/archive/master.zip
*Description
You can find support and descriptions at: https://memolp.de
Information for this version can you find under: https://memolp.de/forum/main-forum
Credits thanks to Nachtschatten and Houzi for helping
thanks to guppy for new zombies and green eyes and more
thanks to Bdubs for Vehicles
thanks to Scomar82 for Disamble Ammo
thanks to Macinvisible and Zyncosa for the nice new Traders
thanks to Xyth for Animals
thanks to Claymore for Stainless Steel back
thanks to MeanCloud for Cooper and Zink
thanks to Snukfin and Robeloto for new zombies and questsounds
and everyone else I forgot
